document.full_text: zambia has asked commodity trader glencore's  mopani copper mines for unpaid taxes after an audit of the subsidiary, leaked earlier this year, said it had underpaid mining dues, the country's finance minister said.
document.title: zambia asks glencore unit for "underpaid" taxes
lines_and_colors: zambia has asked commodity trader glencore's  mopani copper mines for unpaid taxes after an audit of the subsidiary, leaked earlier this year, said it had underpaid mining dues, the country's finance minister said.
